name: jetbrains-recent-projects
title: JetBrains Recent Projects
description: Quickly list and open recent JetBrains IDE projects directly from Vicinae. Supports IntelliJ IDEA, WebStorm, PyCharm and other JetBrains IDEs.
author: FurkanTRN

commands.name: jetbrains-projects
commands.title: JetBrains Projects
commands.subtitle: Open recent JetBrains IDE projects
commands.description: Lists recent projects from JetBrains IDEs and lets you open them instantly.

preferences.name: toolboxAppsDirInput
preferences.title: JetBrains Toolbox Apps Directory
preferences.description: Tools installation location (Toolbox apps). Usually ~/.local/share/JetBrains/Toolbox/apps. Leave empty to auto-detect.

preferences.name: toolboxScriptsDirInput
preferences.title: JetBrains Toolbox Scripts Directory
preferences.description: Shell scripts location generated by Toolbox. Usually ~/.local/share/JetBrains/Toolbox/scripts. Leave empty to auto-detect.
